subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Morris Claiborne, the soft-spoken player who won the Jim Thorpe Award for the country’s best defensive back, has found a way to star opposite Tyrann Mathieu, a Heisman finalist.
snippet: Morris Claiborne, the soft-spoken player who won the Jim Thorpe Award for the country’s best defensive back, has found a way to star opposite Tyrann Mathieu, a Heisman finalist.
